name: SOL Cycling
description:
Many months have passed and we lack electricity, water and food. Our fragile colony is crumbling. We were not prepared - we thought we were alone.
The bikes were an obvious solution; they require little resources and are just fast enough to get passed the swarms.
We will work together to take back control of the supply lines. We will ride to survive...

Gameplay:

An MMO that will have you riding with friends on real Mars terrain thanks to images from NASA's JPL & UofA. But you are not alone, help secure the supply lines and deliver the cargo - ride to survive!

  • Buy the game - you get the game (Early Access)
  • No in app purchases
  • No pay to win items

Terrain:

  • Real Mars Terrain
  • 4K Textures
  • Realistic Weather Effects

Rider:

  • Your Real Legs
  • Simulated Mars Physics, such as Gravity & Air Resistance
  • Mechanical Pressure Spandex & Polymer Space Suits

Bike:

  • Nickel-Titanium Shape Memory Wheels
  • Inbuilt Moxie Life Support System
  • Safety Lights and Suspension

EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS:

You will need a speed or power source to get moving!

Smart Trainers:
- CycleOps H3 Direct Drive
- ELITE Suito Interactive Trainer
- Garmin Tacx Flow Smart Trainer
- Tacx Flux S Direct Drive Smart Trainer

OR

Spin Bikes*:
- Wahoo Kickr Bike
- Stages Cycling Smart Bike
- Tacx Neo smart bike
- Wattbike Atom,
- Echelon Smart Connect EX3
- Sportstech SX400 Speedbike
- Reebok ZJET 460 Exercise Bike
*Your local gym may have a compatible spin bike and SOL is also currently available on iOS mobile.

OR

Speed Sensors**:
- Wahoo RPM Speed and Cadence sensor
- Magene S3+ Cycling Speed and Cadence Sensor
- KE LIN Bicycle 2 in 1 Speed Cadence Sensor

OR

Power Meter**:
- Stages Power
- Garmin Vector3
**These are cheaper options, however you will need to lift your rear wheel somehow or attach them to a dumb/spin bike.

Alternative to Bluetooth:
ANT+ vs Bluetooth:
Although your devices may more readily have Bluetooth, the services advertised on Bluetooth are not all the same, so some devices may not work well with Bluetooth. If you have an option to connect via ANT+ we recommend this. Search for ANT+ dongle, such as:
- Anself USB ANT+ Stick for Garmin Forerunner
